description: Real wiki examples for template handling from actual wiki pages

cases.name: cite file template
cases.wikitext: Create a file in {{cite file|gfx/portraits/portrait_modifiers}} with any filename
cases.expected: Create a file in `/Crusader Kings III/game/gfx/portraits/portrait_modifiers` with any filename

cases.name: path template
cases.wikitext: All models can be found in {{path|gfx/models/}}
cases.expected: All models can be found in `/Crusader Kings III/game/gfx/models/`

cases.name: expand template
cases.expected: > ⚠️ **This section needs expansion with examples, advanced uses**
